alert.note: Alert for East Sweetwater County; Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Natrona County Lower Elevations (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued October 21 at 3:39PM MDT until October 22 at 5:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING THROUGH SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. Gusts up to 70 mph expected along Outer Drive in Casper. * WHERE...Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range, Natrona County Lower Elevations and East Sweetwater County. * WHEN...From Saturday morning through Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: East Sweetwater County; Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Natrona County Lower Elevations
